info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 4:23PM EDT until July 24 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cortland County in central New York... Northwestern Chenango County in central New York... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 423 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Freetown, or 8 miles northeast of Marathon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oxford, Cincinnatus, Preston, Willet, Pitcher, Pharsalia, Taylor, German, Mc Donough and East Freetown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
